results.content: This is THE course to look upto when considering to build a twitter API through NodeJS! The Author is also very supportive of the questions when asked. Worth every penny.

results.content: It was a little bit to short and should at least describe what Twitter API is cappable to do. Not only search twits and post them.

response.content: This is designed as a short course showing how to access the Twitter API and not intended to go into detail about what is contained within the tweet object.  The course provides source code and step by step guideance

results.content: Short and sweet. Take a tour of the Twitter API with a GURU who knows his stuff inside and out. Very cool, quick course!
